analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/35/0xe2dcd10f43cd9229f253e5147a793e6f64283f2b.sol:
	Contract DayDayToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/35/0xe2dcd10f43cd9229f253e5147a793e6f64283f2b.sol#270-272)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
